title: Phineas and Ferb
description: Phineas and Ferb embark on various adventures during their summer vacation, while trying to keep their sister from interfering with their plans.

title: Dr. Oakley, Yukon Vet
description: Meet Dr Oakley, vet to pretty much everything that moves in the Yukon, making house calls across thousands of square miles, helping animals wild and domestic.

title: The Outsider
description: When a supernatural force edges its way into a seemingly straightforward murder investigation, it leads a seasoned cop to question everything he believes in.

title: Kodalu Diddina Kapuram
description: Kodalu Diddina Kapuram is a Telugu TV show on Maa TV. This family drama is all about what happens when Sasikala steps into a family as a new bride and challenges all that is laid down by the strict matriarch, Shanti!

title: Anjali
description: After the birth of their twins, Surya separates his differently-abled daughter Anjali from his wife and son to raise her alone. Will his truth be out?

title: Dhrubatara
description: Childhood friends Tara and Agni are secretly in love with each other. But their happiness is short-lived when Dhruva, a shrewd businessman enters their life.

title: Senthoora Poove
description: For the sake of his children, a middle-aged Durai marries Roja, who is half his age. Will this marriage of convenience turn into their 'happily ever after'?

title: On Pointe
description: On Pointe follows students during a season in the School of American Ballet (SAB) in New York City.

title: Aashiqana
description: When a medical trial spurs a deadly menace, Yash and Chikki must race against time to unravel a gruesome conspiracy whilst dealing with a foe from the past.

title: The Proud Family: Louder and Prouder
description: Newly 14-year-old Penny Proud and her Proud Family have several adventures and misadventures as they navigate modern life with hilarity and heart.
primaryTitle: The Proud Family: Louder and Prouder
originalTitle: The Proud Family: Louder and Prouder

title: Dadi Amma.. Dadi Amma Maan Jaao!
description: Shraddha and Anjali are millennial sisters living with their 75-year-old kids, the grandparents to care for. How will this quirky family strike a balance?
primaryTitle: Dadi Amma.. Dadi Amma Maan Jaao!
originalTitle: Dadi Amma.. Dadi Amma Maan Jaao!

title: Doctor Lawyer
description: Genius surgeon Han Yi-han makes a life-altering decision to become a lawyer specialising in medical crimes after losing a patient to surgical malpractice.

title: We Own This City
description: Chronicling the rise and fall of the Baltimore Police Department's Gun Trace Task Force and the corruption and moral collapse that befell this American city.

title: Encore!
description: Kristen Bell reunites former high school classmates from around the U.S. to re-stage the musicals of their youth, years after they originally performed them.

title: The Baby
description: 38-year-old Natasha is furious that her closest friends are all having babies. But when she unexpectedly ends up with a baby, her life takes a horrifying turn.

title: Marvel's Inhumans
description: After a coup attempt by the military against King Black Bolt, the people of Attilan must find a way to escape and survive persecution.

title: Thayillamal Nannilai
description: A special bond that spans years! Watch Vijay TV stars gather to celebrate the greatness of motherhood with their supermoms.

title: National Treasure: Edge of History
description: NEW EPISODE EVERY WEDNESDAY AT 1:30 PM. A young woman sets out to find an ancient treasure with mysterious ties to her family’s past.

title: The Great North
description: SHOW ON BREAK- NEXT EPISODE ON 20TH FEB. Follow the Alaskan adventures of the Tobin family, a single dad Beef tries to keep his kids close.

title: The Great Indian Murder
description: When notorious industrialist Vicky Rai is shot dead at his own party, the main suspects are the guests, both invited and uninvited.

title: Khichdi
description: The Parekhs are back! This time, Babuji, Praful, Hansa, Jayshree, Himanshu, Chakki and Jackie bring the house down with their crazy antics. Like literally!

title: Om Namah Shivay
description: Based on the enigmatic legends of Lord Shiva, watch how he brings justice to the universe with his great might and infinite knowledge.

title: Shaq
description: A four-part docuseries chronicling the life of NBA legend Shaquille O’Neal, who transcended the sport of basketball and transformed himself into a cultural icon.

title: Kuch Toh Hai Tere Mere Darmiyaan
description: Dil ke paas dimaag nahin hota, aur jo dimaag se ho, wo pyar nahin hota. Follow the love stories of Raj, Koel and Madhavan, as destiny ties their lives together!
primaryTitle: Kuch Toh Hai Tere Mere Darmiyaan
originalTitle: Kuch Toh Hai Tere Mere Darmiyaan

title: Karthika Deepam
description: After a tragic accident, an estranged Deepa goes against all odds to bring her family back together. Will fate play its part and help her succeed?

title: Rajjo
description: Amid a calamity, Rajjo, an athletically-gifted girl, gets separated from her mother. Despite the odds, she embarks on an inspiring journey whilst finding love.

title: Billy Dilley's Super-Duper Subterranean Summer
description: When Billy’s science fair project goes horribly wrong, he and his lab partners, Zeke and Marsha, find themselves stuck in a strange land in the middle of the Earth.

title: Single Long
description: A group of friends living their post-college lives in Chicago navigate work, life and most of all singledom.

title: Kundanapu Bomma
description: Kundanapu Bomma is a Telugu TV serial on Maa TV. This romance drama is a story about an average-looking Suhasini and rich boy, Yuvraaj. Suhasini faces an uphill task of winning her husband's love, and be accepted in her marital home.

title: Shaka Laka Boom Boom
description: Sanju finds a magical pencil, which has the power to bring anything he draws to life. While Fun at first, the pencil opens more mystical adventures.

title: Superstars
description: Catch up with your favourite cricketing heroes and know about their off-field/personal life stories

title: Crashing
description: A comedian who has nowhere to stay when he discovers that his wife is unfaithful, leading him to reevaluate his life amidst the New York City comedy scene.

title: Saam Daam Dand Bhed
description: When Vijay Namdhari aspires to be a political leader, his lust for power tests his bonds of love, family and friendship.

title: Nuvva Nena
description: Nuvva Nena is a Telugu TV serial on Maa Gold TV. It's about the journey of Sher, who eventually stands up to his mother's tyranny. This family drama is set against a UP backdrop.

title: Devyani
description: Devyani is an orphan, who has to put up with atrocities in her marital home, even as she falls in love with Ekka, her uncultured husband!

title: Dil Sambhal Jaa Zara
description: As a revenge against her scheming mother, Ahana marries a much-older Anant. With vengeance at the centre, will true love have a chance?

title: India's Next Superstars
description: The television's biggest talent hunt is here as Karan Johar and Rohit Shetty set their eyes on finding India's Next Superstars, where only talent will matter!

title: Teri Laadli Main
description: Born as a mute girl into a family that desperately wanted a boy, Bitti struggles for love and acceptance. Will fate reunite her with her guardian angel Akshat?

title: Fish the Dish
description: Follow Chef Spencer Watts as he cooks his favourite seafood dishes in preparation for his new cookbook all about fish.

title: Ajeeb Dastaan Hai Yeh
description: Shobha is shattered when her politician-husband is caught in a scandal. As she rediscovers her life, she finds an unlikely friend in her boss, Vikram.

title: Thipkyanchi Rangoli
description: Shashank, a scholar from a middle-class joint family, meets free-spirited and sophisticated Apurva. What will happen when these two opposites collide?

title: Mukesh Jasoos
description: A quintessential loser and detective with questionable skills and laughable methods navigates through petty crimes. However, something sinister is brewing.

title: Shanti
description: Shanti sacrificed a lot to become a perfect wife, mother and daughter-in-law, only to be disrespected in return. Will she ever get to live on her own terms?

title: His Dark Materials
description: Lyra, a brave young woman from another world, on a quest to rescue her kidnapped friend, uncovers a sinister plot of the Magisterium.

title: Get Out Alive with Bear Grylls
description: Ten teams of two compete to survive in the wild of New Zealand with Bear Grylls as their guide, where the winning team gets $500,000.
primaryTitle: Get Out Alive with Bear Grylls
originalTitle: Get Out Alive with Bear Grylls

title: The Kardashians
description: The family you love is here with an all-access pass into their lives. Kris, Kourtney, Kim, Khloé, Kendall, and Kylie unveil the truth behind the headlines.

title: Shaurya Aur Suhani
description: Shaurya is a prince brought up in a forest, unaware of his royal roots. His fight and struggle for his kingdom intertwines with his lady love, Princess Suhani.

title: Soundtrack #1
description: When Eun-soo is asked to write lyrics for a song by a famous composer, she seeks help from her longtime friend turned housemate, Sun-woo.

title: Geetha Govindam
description: An innocent girl, falls in love with a chauvinist guy. However, soon they realise that their personalities are polar opposites. Will this chalk and cheese union lead to a "happily ever after"?

title: Ek Boond Ishq
description: Strong-willed Tara marries the fiercely troubled Mrityunjay, unaware of his dark past. Will an ounce of love be enough to transform their lives?

title: Aanchal
description: Tushu sets out to avenge the insult on her family. Watch her journey to empowerment and her attempt at making the women in her village self-sufficient.

title: Big City Greens
description: A country boy shifts to a metropolitan city with his family from their rural farm. With new things to explore every day, he tries to adjust to the new life.

title: Kavacha
description: An intriguing story of love and reincarnation! Gauri and Raj reunite after 28 years, only to encounter their disastrous past.

title: City of Dreams
description: Ameya Gaikwad has lost everything to his daughter, Poornima. As her popularity grows, so does his desperation to stop her from eclipsing him completely.

title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
description: The Grand Army of the Republic, led by Yoda, Mace Windu, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker and other Jedi Knights, fights the New Droid Army of the Separatists.

title: Getting On
description: Getting On follows anxious doctors and administrators as they struggle with the darkly comic and brutally honest realities of caring for the elderly.

title: Band Of Brothers
description: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division, and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord, through V-J Day.

title: Westworld
description: In a futuristic amusement park, Westworld, the visitors interact with automatons. However, all hell breaks loose when the automatons begin malfunctioning.

title: Parallels
description: The lives of four childhood friends are seriously disrupted when a mysterious event separates them, sending them into parallel dimensions.

title: Link: Eat, Love, Kill
description: When Eun Gye-hoon moves back to a familiar town, he finds himself experiencing strange emotions and realises he shares a connection with a woman who lives there.

title: 9 Hours
description: Three prisoners, three teams, three banks and nine hours to pull off three impossible heists and return to jail. Can they do it?

title: Banni Chow Home Delivery
description: Self-sufficient Banni runs her meal delivery service. However, her life turns upside down when she is tasked with feeding a rich but emotionally unstable Yuvan.

title: Dance Dance Danseur
description: Jumpei Murao gave up on ballet after the death of his father. One day, Miyako Godai sees his interest in ballet and invites him to join her.

title: Dill Mill Gayye
description: Four interns enter Sanjeevani to become the best doctors. Through heartbreaks, trials and relationships they try to balance their professional duties.

title: Nabab Nandini
description: Struck by a tragedy, Nandini gets torn between her dreams and familial responsibilities. Things take a turn when Nabab enters her life as a guiding light.

title: Sketch
description: A man who lost his love, and a woman who draws the future work hand-in-hand to capture a murderer.

title: Alaska's Grizzly Gauntlet
description: Survival expert Les Stroud explores the formidable wildlife and uncovers the secrets to their survival in America's final frontier.

title: What If...?
description: What If…? flips the script on the MCU, reimagining famous events from the films in unexpected ways.

title: The Little Mermaid
description: Prequel to the 1989 feature film, the series dives into a whole season’s worth of new adventures and new characters in the undersea world of Atlantica.

title: Chandrashekhar
description: Chandrashekhar Azad is one of India's most revered revolutionaries. Relive this fearless and valiant rebel's story, who shook the foundation of the British Raj.

title: Run
description: Ruby Richardson's life is thrown upside down when she receives a text from her college sweetheart inviting her to drop everything and meet him in New York.

title: Faltu
description: What’s in a name? Amid the arid landscape of Rajasthan, a dreamy-eyed young woman battles to prove her mettle whilst navigating through cultural stereotypes.

title: Phoenix Rising
description: A two-part documentary exploring actor and activist Evan Rachel Wood’s experience as a survivor of domestic abuse and her pursuit of justice.

title: Mildred Pierce
description: An epic story of a proud single mother, struggling to earn her daughter’s love during the Great Depression in middle-class Los Angeles.

title: Bhopal to Vegas
description: Three friends join hands to discreetly organize Las Vegas-styled bachelor parties in Bhopal. But can such wild and mad gatherings be a secret for long?

title: Sasneham
description: An old-age home reunites past lovers Indira and Balachandran. Having lost faith in family, their life gets a new meaning when they meet Madhuri and Nandan.

title: The Pacific
description: The Pacific tracks the intertwined real-life stories of three U.S. Marines across the vast canvas of the Pacific Theater during World War II.

title: Shree Gurudeva Dutta
description: The manifestation of Brahma-Vishnu-Mahesh, he is the saviour of Dharma, Bhoomi, and Bhakti. Witness the miracles of Shree Gurudeva Dutta and his avatars.

title: Chhatriwali
description: A perfect take on opposites attract, Independent Madhura meets the carefree Vikrant. Hatred soon turns into love when fate intervenes.

title: The Goddess
description: The story of Patricia Teherán and her great love, Ricardo Cabello, the man who led her to confront social prejudice, in love and on stage.

title: Pixar Popcorn
description: Grab a quick snack of Pixar with this collection of mini shorts starring your favorite characters.

title: Priyamanasam
description: Dubbed version of Ishqbaaaz, it is a story about three brothers - Shiva, Omkara and Rudra - who share an unbreakable bond despite their dysfunctional family.

title: Bamini and Boys
description: When Bamini is about to lose her house, the boys join hands to avoid the catastrophe, only to set into motion a string of painfully hilarious incidents.

title: Wicked Tuna
description: In one of the most regulated fisheries on earth, the giant Bluefin tuna fishermen of Gloucester battle to make a living by catching one tuna at a time.

title: How I Met Your Mother
description: Ted Mosby, an architect, recounts to his children the events that led him to meet their mother.

title: American Horror Story
description: American Horror Story explores the subversive modern horror tales of haunted houses, witches, asylum, hotels, lost colonies, cults and apocalypse.

title: Mehndi Hai Rachne Waali
description: Despite being married under unfavourable circumstances, Pallavi and Raghav fall in love with each other. But what happens when Pallavi's first husband returns?

title: Adamas
description: Twin brothers Woo-sin and Suh-yeon lose their father in a murder case. Twenty-two years later, the brothers seek to clear their father's name.

title: Siragadikka Aasai
description: Circumstances force Meena, a family-centric girl, to marry Muthu, a thug. Will this unfortunate marriage turn into love?

title: Moon Knight
description: Mild-mannered Steven Grant has dissociative identity disorder and shares a body with a mercenary.

title: Lalit 205
description: Meet the Rajadhyakshas of Lalit 205. In the era of disconnected nuclear families, this bunch will rekindle the nostalgia of being in a joint family.

title: Aranmanai Kili
description: Young and carefree Janaki is forced to marry a rich wheelchair-bound Arjun. Will she break free from the shackles of marriage to fulfill her dreams?

title: Will Trent
description: SHOW ON BREAK- NEXT EPISODE ON 15TH FEB. Special Agent Will Trent is determined to make sure no one is abandoned like he was and has the highest clearance rate in the Georgia Bureau.

title: Dil Hai Hindustani
description: Sway to the tunes of the best Hindi/Bollywood music talent scouted from across the globe by judges Sunidhi Chauhan, Pritam and Badshah.

title: On The Brink
description: The series reveals the hidden splendours of India’s natural world by exploring threatened species and unseen habitats with the help of local conservationists.

title: Mahanadhi
description: Tragedy befalls a happy middle-class family after their father Saravanan's sudden demise. Now, his daughters must find hope while overcoming the conflicts in life.
